name: autone
headline: Inventory management SaaS for Retail & Consumer brands
description:
Today, Retailers have to make 1000s of complex operational decisions every day, all impacting their bottom line.This problem is being currently tackled with excel or legacy systems, both no longer fit for purpose.

We make a platform that lets retailers make optimal decisions, easily and quickly. We ingest a retailer's data, generate recommendations and then allow users to approve a given action. Our platform covers topics including product pricing, inventory replenishment and re-ordering with the goal of covering all operational processes.

founders.name: Adil Bouhdadi, Founder
founders.description:
Over his career, Adil has worked within the retail industry across leading luxury fashion companies in Paris, New York, and London. In 2020, he co-founded Autone to help retail & consumer goods businesses scale their performances by accurately understanding, planning and forecasting their sales & operation flows.
In his free time, Adil enjoys exploring Italy on the weekend, visiting family in Marrakech,
or traveling around Europe.

founders.name: Harry Cheslaw, Founder
founders.description:
I am a london based technical / product founder focusing currently on the retail space. 

In 2020, I co-founded Autone to help retail & consumer goods businesses scale their performances by accurately understanding, planning and forecasting their sales & operation flows.

I am always happy to chat and help others so do not hesitate to reach out!

# The right product,the right place, the right time.
Optimize your inventory decisions, avoid stockouts and boost your sales—all from one engine powered by clarity and intuition.
[Book a demo](https://autone.io/</contact/>)
Tech designed to be trusted
![](https://pelostudio-storyblok-assets.b-cdn.net/f/255335/1656x832/f4cfd55c9f/etude_cover.png/m/smart/filters:quality\(70\))
[Let’s talk](https://autone.io/</contact/>)
## Turn your inventory into your superpower.
Our modules don’t just monitor inventory—they analyze, predict, and recommend. Like what you see? Check and implement in just a few clicks.Navigate through inventory forecasts, market trends, seasonal shifts and buyer influences with unmatched precision. 
[Book a demo](https://autone.io/</contact/>)
![](https://pelostudio-storyblok-assets.b-cdn.net/f/255335/1048x1048/f679b07b11/contentcolumns1.png/m/fit-in/smart/filters:quality\(70\))![](https://pelostudio-storyblok-assets.b-cdn.net/f/255335/1048x1048/b6d46bf526/contentcolumns2-2.png/m/fit-in/smart/filters:quality\(70\))![](https://pelostudio-storyblok-assets.b-cdn.net/f/255335/1048x1048/5f1ae42b79/contentcolumns3.png/m/fit-in/smart/filters:quality\(70\))
## Better informed actions.
## Faster than ever.
![](https://pelostudio-storyblok-assets.b-cdn.net/f/255335/1248x1950/49afa1eb65/feature-1.jpg/m/smart/filters:quality\(70\):format\(webp\))
### Make better decisions
Our modules help you make targeted decisions. Easily see mismatches, product potential, stock levels and more. 
![](https://pelostudio-storyblok-assets.b-cdn.net/f/255335/832x1300/a19cf5438a/feature-2.jpg/m/smart/filters:quality\(70\):format\(webp\))
### Buy for business growth
The autone platform seamlessly blends AI-driven recommendations with the irreplaceable intuition of industry experts.
![](https://pelostudio-storyblok-assets.b-cdn.net/f/255335/1248x1950/172f20484e/feature-3.jpg/m/smart/filters:quality\(70\):format\(webp\))
### Trust and calibration
We help you implement and understand our recommendations, balancing machine intelligence and human expertise.
## This is not just software. This is strategy.
Growth doesn’t happen in spreadsheets. Yes, our platform helps you automate tasks, but more importantly: it amplifies the strategic potential of your inventory.With autone you get straight-forward recommendations about what to buy, replenish, rebalance and restock, so you can act quickly and confidently.
[Discover more](https://autone.io/</contact/>)
GROW
+35%
### growth in sales
Sell more by selling the right products. Stock up on our recommendations.
PERFORM
80%
### less stockouts
Never leave your customers wanting. Ensure you can always deliver.
AUTOMATE
95%
### less manual hassle 
Let your team do what it does best. Replace routine with results.
![](https://pelostudio-storyblok-assets.b-cdn.net/f/255335/1656x1834/a781339da3/offwhite.png/m/smart/filters:quality\(70\))
![](https://pelostudio-storyblok-assets.b-cdn.net/f/255335/901x1125/b5e167830a/lanvin3.webp/m/smart/filters:quality\(70\))
![](https://pelostudio-storyblok-assets.b-cdn.net/f/255335/2560x3840/116560dc2d/cavalli.webp/m/smart/filters:quality\(70\))
![](https://pelostudio-storyblok-assets.b-cdn.net/f/255335/1800x1200/cb7469ca2f/attirethestudio.webp/m/smart/filters:quality\(70\))
![](https://pelostudio-storyblok-assets.b-cdn.net/f/255335/3943x5914/148a5f4269/dweet2.webp/m/smart/filters:quality\(70\))
![](https://pelostudio-storyblok-assets.b-cdn.net/f/255335/1000x1000/fc04a57aed/100ml.webp/m/smart/filters:quality\(70\))
Brilliant product, mindset and vision.
Olivier Germain, Chief Product Officer at Off-White
A fantastic platform which modernises the way in merchandising and planning teams work together.
Constance Tsatsanis, Merchandising Director at Lanvin
The most forward-thinking inventory management platform I've seen in the industry.
Arnaud Bazin, VP of Merchandising at Roberto Cavalli
autone has made our lives so much easier, and working every day with the team is a pleasure.
Elodie Monnier, Chief of Staff at Attire The Studio
autone’s in-depth knowledge of retail allied with their proprietary tech is a winning combination for brands.
Laurent Piffaut, Chief Executive Officer at Dweet
With autone, we've been able to grow our business in a strong and structured way.
Katie Cervini, Chief Executive Officer at 100ML
![](https://pelostudio-storyblok-assets.b-cdn.net/f/255335/692x842/8890daa82e/calculator-receipt-1.png/m/smart/filters:quality\(70\))![](https://pelostudio-storyblok-assets.b-cdn.net/f/255335/692x842/f3ec27de22/calculator-receipt-2.png/m/smart/filters:quality\(70\))

generated_description:
**Company Overview: autone**

Founded in 2021 and hailing from London, UK, autone addresses a pervasive issue in retail: the complexity of inventory management. With thousands of critical operational decisions to make daily, retailers often find themselves grappling with outdated tools like Excel or legacy software that simply can’t handle the modern demands of their business. Enter autone—an innovative SaaS platform designed specifically for Retail and Consumer brands to streamline inventory management.

**Mission and Product Offering**

autone’s mission is clear: to simplify inventory management while maximizing efficiency and profit margins. The platform ingests a retailer's data, generates actionable insights about product pricing, inventory replenishment, and reordering, and seamlessly integrates these recommendations into daily operations. This is not just about tackling inventory; it’s about transforming how decisions are made within the retail space—fast, simple, and data-driven.

By empowering retailers to make optimal decisions, autone not only helps avoid stockouts but also boosts sales. With an emphasis on clarity and intuition, their software becomes a trusted ally for merchants aiming to navigate the complexities of product management.

**Growth and Achievements**

As part of the prestigious Y Combinator Batch S22, autone has managed to attract attention and secure a solid footing in the industry. Recently, they raised $17 million in a Series A funding round, enabling further development and outreach of their platform, which already boasts a user-friendly interface customized for various sectors including fashion, cosmetics, and accessories.

**Team and Company Culture**

The company operates with a team of 20 dedicated employees, guided by industry insights and collaborative effort. Working under the stewardship of Group Partner Aaron Epstein, autone is committed to blending AI-driven recommendations with the nuanced understanding of human experts—essentially, a combination of machine learning and human intuition.

**Impact Statement**

With features designed to optimize inventory decisions, autone reports notable metrics: a 35% growth in sales, an 80% reduction in stockouts, and a remarkable 95% decrease in manual tasks. These statistics speak to their ability to significantly reduce operational hassles while enhancing profitability for their clients.

autone stands at the intersection of technology and strategic retail management, poised to reshape how businesses manage inventory. Retailers looking for clarity in decisions and empowerment in operations can book a demo through their website [autone.io](https://autone.io) and step into a new era of inventory management.
